text: The Junpai CX65 () is a compact CUV produced by Junpai, a sub-brand of FAW Group. == History == The vehicle was unveiled at Auto Shanghai in April 2017 and is being sold exclusively in China since April 2018. The saloon Junpai A50 uses the same platform. == References == CX65 Category:Front-wheel-drive vehicles Category:Crossover sport utility vehicles Category:2010s cars Category:Cars introduced in 2018
title: Junpai CX65
